title: 84/361/EEC: Council Decision of 30 June 1984 concerning an aid granted to farmers in the Federal Republic of Germany
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 30 June 1984
concerning an aid granted to farmers in the Federal Republic of Germany
(84/361/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the period 1 July 1984 to 31 December 1988 the aid granted by the Federal Republic of Germany in the form of VAT relief shall be deemed to be compatible with the common market up to a maximum of 5 % of the ex-VAT price paid by the purchaser for the agricultural product.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1984.
For the Council
The President
C. CHEYSSON
(1) OJ No L 90, 1. 4. 1984, p. 1.
